attributes.action: Stop all movement of personal data via Laptops and storage devices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We have had enough of the scandalous loss of Laptops and data storage devices in questionable circumstances.

We want a legislation to make it unlawful for anyone to walk the streets with personal data in Laptops and any storage devices.

The encrytion solution suggested by Cabinet Secretary is good but not a sound solution for professionals worth their salt. 

We therefore petition the PM to call on the Parliament to legislate that
all personal data should be held in secure centrally managed database system with access granted to those who use them outside the office through remote internet access to well
passworded and firewalled central system.

When users are not legally allowed to download such data, no personal information will be held in Laptops and no storage devices will hold personal data. 

With this scenario if Laptops are stolen or storage devices misplaced, no personal data will be lost.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
